/** * SVGBezierFigure is not an actual SVG element, it is used by SVGPathFigure to * represent a single BezierPath segment within an SVG path. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 1.0.1 2008-03-20 Fixed computation of clip bounds. *
1.0 April 14, 2007 Created. */
